name: 3rd Invasion - Zombies vs. Steel
description: Have You ever Want to be a General.? Here and now, You Can become the Battlefield General. Imagine building your own Unique Armies and Controlling the way they attack.
minimum_requirements: OS: 8 Processor: Yes Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Some DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: Yes
